name: Maxi Pool Masters VR
description: Maxi pool Masters takes you inside the action in a fun and innovative pool game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: intel i5 Memory: 10 GB RAM Graphics: gtx 1060 3gb DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: gtx 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
